attributes.action: bring into his consideration the terrorist involvement of Altaf Hussain a britisher in Pakistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Altaf hussain a Pakistani born British national has been involved in terrorist activities back in Pakistan since pretty long time now. Wanted to govt in many cases this man left Pakistan in 1992 and has been in UK since then.
His party MQM is considered to be the terrorist group of Pakistan..
His most recent involved into a terrorism in Pakistan was the 12th May 2007 carnage Which killed More than 50 plus in Karachi, and history is full of these sort of brutal offences..
We Would like to make a request to the honourable PM to bring this matter into consideration and take serious actions against such man who is a threat to the reputation of United kingdom abroad.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
